Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "+EmitApp is a tool to create advanced emit schedules. It has a minor array of tools available through a dialog system using the popup-technology of SkotOS."

"+emitapp\\r\\n Open the +EmitApp tool window.\\r\\n\\r\\n+emitapp h\\r\\n Display command-line help.\\r\\n\\r\\n+emitapp list\\r\\n List available +EmitApp configurations in your body. A +EmitApp configuration is created through the popup interface.\\r\\n\\r\\n+emitapp start mooingcows\\r\\n Start the +EmitApp configuration \\"mooingcows\\" immediately.\\r\\n\\r\\n+emitapp schedule in 1 h \\"mooingcows\\"\\r\\n Schedule the +EmitApp configuration \\"mooingcows\\" to start in 1 hour.\\r\\n\\r\\n+emitapp abort 1\\r\\n Abort the +EmitApp schedule with the ID 1."
